1242620.name: HUNGRY TEA PARTY
1242620.description:
You're invited to an afternoon of conversation over tea and cake with three strange new friends.

A point and click dark comedy game with four different endings and a total playtime of 20-30 minutes.

RSVP if you dare, and welcome to the tea party!

***ANNOUNCEMENT***

We'd like to let everyone know that this game will be retired at the end of July 2021. After that time, it will still be available in your Steam library, and you will still be able to download, install, and launch the game from there. The Steam Community will remain visible and accessible for you to post and share in, and the store page for the game will stay up, but the game will not appear in store listings.

Thank you very much for downloading and playing HUNGRY TEA PARTY, and please look forward to future releases from NUMBER7!
